channel.title: FLF - CrossPolitic Show
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Biography on Olaudah Equiano w/ Pastor Luke Walker (FlashBack Friday) [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description: Originally aired on Jan 23, 2018, Pastor Luke Walker joined the guys to discuss his biography on Olaudah Equiano. Equiano was kidnapped in the West African slave trade, predestinarian Protestant, free market entrepreneur, and literary abolitionist.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Darren Doane's New Book: Don't Be Precious [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description: In this episode of CrossPolitic, Darren Doane joins the Chocolate Knox and Gabe to discuss his new book, *Don't Be Precious*. We dive into Darren's creative philosophy, exploring how to break free from perfectionism and embrace a raw, action-oriented approach to content creation. Whether you’re in filmmaking, music, or just looking to unlock your creative potential, Darren’s insights challenge conventional wisdom on art and work. Tune in for an inspiring discussion that’s all about pushing boundaries and getting things done without overthinking.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Call Her Daddy - Trump, Kamala, and The Media Between [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
What in the world is going on in the media? Kamala was on Call Her Daddy, and Trump was on Andrew Schulz. Where did all the power these influencers and podcasters have come from? and Why on earth would we even care?

Don’t forget to Sign up for The FLF Conference 2024 (Prodigal America) https://flfnetwork.com/prodigal-america/
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: 28 Days To Election - Countdown Begins!!! [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description: Who is telling the truth? And how can they politicize storms? 28 days until the presidential election, join the tumult of the countdown!!

item.title: AI & Legacy: Building a Family Business For The Future W/ Aaron Youngren [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description: In this episode of CrossPolitic, we are joined by special guest Aaron Youngren to dive into the impact of the port strikes and their implications on the economy and global trade. Aaron also shares insights from his new book, 'Undiscovered', in which he writes about faith, resilience, and navigating the unknown in today's ever-changing culture, and applies it to the business world. Don't miss out on this engaging conversation! ➡️ Don't forget to LIKE, SHARE, and SUBSCRIBE to stay updated on future episodes! And come join us for our conference in Fort Worth Texas!! https://flfnetwork.com/prodigal-america/
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Come Hell or High Waters: Port Strikes, Floods, And Presidential Elections [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Join the Guys for Beer & Psalms, and a recap from Gabe and Toby on the Vice Presidents debate, and talk about the Port and Barge Strikes and The floods whipping through Tennessee.

Don’t forget to Sign up for The FLF Conference 2024 (Prodigal America) https://flfnetwork.com/prodigal-america/
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Vance vs. Walz: Vice Presidents’ Face Off [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Join Guys for this special episode of CrossPolitic, as we live-stream the highly anticipated Vice Presidential Debate between Ohio Senator J.D. Vance and Minnesota Governor Tim Walz. This debate marks a critical moment in the lead-up to the election, occurring just five weeks before voters head to the polls on November 5. Tune in as we provide live commentary and analysis during the debate. Our team will break down key moments and discuss their implications for the upcoming election. Engage with us through social media using #CrossPoliticDebate to share your thoughts and insights!

See Ya’ll in four weeks in Fort Worth TX!! https://flfnetwork.com/prodigal-america/
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Failed Freedom & The 75th Anniversary of the CCP w/ Missionary Ben [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Today the Guys are joined by Missionary Ben to talk about the Hong Kong riots and the founding of the church in China. October is the 75th anniversary of the Chinese Communist Party, and the 5th Anniversary of the Failed Freedom Protests in Hong Kong. Get Missionary Ben's new book!! https://www.amazon.com/Memoirs-William-Milne-Missionary-1785-1822-ebook/dp/B0DJ1Q4HNR/

See Ya'll in a month at The FLF Conference 2024 (Prodigal America) https://flfnetwork.com/prodigal-america/
item.author: FLF, LLC
